issue.title: [Rust] Add documentation to lib.rs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10148](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10148). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the crate page looks rather empty.

This issue aims to move the documentation from the README to the crate, so that it has a broader audience and follows Rust best practices.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10148?focusedCommentId=17205942) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8310
